questions.question: Assignment due in 6 hours. Progress: 0%. Your move? 🤔
options: 🎮 Play one more game to 'relax' first
☕ Make coffee and accept my fate

feedback.correct: Wise choice! Caffeine is the engineer's superpower! ⚡
feedback.wrong: Bold strategy! Let's see if it pays off... 😅

questions.funFact: Studies show 83% of engineers complete assignments in the last 17% of available time.

questions.question: How do you feel about deadlines? 📅
options: 💀 The grim reaper of my social life

feedback.correct: Exactly! Nothing like last-minute panic to boost productivity! 🚀
feedback.wrong: Interesting perspective... The graveyard is that way ➡️

questions.funFact: NUET students have a 99.9% deadline meeting rate... in the last 0.1% of time available.

questions.question: Professor extends deadline by 2 days. Your reaction? 🎉
options: 😱 Panic! Now I have to pretend I was working on it
🎮 Perfect! 47 more hours of gaming time
📚 Actually use the time to improve my work (LOL)

feedback.correct: Smart! Sleep is the foundation of all-nighters! 💤
feedback.wrong: Optimistic! I like your energy... misguided, but energetic!

questions.funFact: Deadline extensions paradoxically increase last-minute submissions by 100%.

questions.question: Group project due next week. Your contribution so far? 👥
options: 👀 'Seen' all messages but replied to none
💪 Did everything at 2 AM before deadline
🎨 Made the cover page look pretty

feedback.correct: The hero we need but don't deserve! 🦸
feedback.wrong: Valid contribution... in an alternate universe 🌌

questions.funFact: In group projects, 90% of work is done by 10% of the team. You know who you are.

questions.question: You have 3 assignments due this week. Strategy? 🎯
options: 😎 Do the easiest one first to feel productive
⏰ Wait until they're all due tomorrow, then panic efficiently

feedback.correct: Batch processing at its finest! Maximum efficiency! 📊
feedback.wrong: That's... certainly a strategy. Not THE strategy, but A strategy.

questions.funFact: Simultaneous panic increases productivity by 300% according to NUET research.

questions.question: How many cups of coffee is 'too many'? ☕
options: ♾️ Coffee? More like water with benefits

feedback.correct: Ah, a true NUET veteran! Your veins flow with caffeine! ☕
feedback.wrong: Those are rookie numbers! Gotta pump those up! 💪

questions.funFact: NUET cafeteria sells an average of 2,000 cups of coffee daily. To 400 students.

questions.question: It's 3 AM. Your drink of choice? 🌙
options: 💊 Pre-workout powder straight from the jar

feedback.correct: No compromises at 3 AM! Pure fuel! ⚡
feedback.wrong: Creative! But black coffee is the engineering way.

questions.funFact: 3 AM is statistically the most productive hour for engineering students.

questions.question: Rate your coffee dependency (1-10) 📊
options: 💀 Error 404: Life without coffee not found

feedback.correct: Welcome to the club! Your membership card is brewing! 🎖️
feedback.wrong: Denial is the first stage... of needing more coffee.

questions.funFact: NUET's motto: 'Powered by Coffee, Fueled by Deadlines, Driven by Memes'

questions.question: Campus coffee shop closed. Emergency plan? 🚨
options: 🧪 Make coffee from chemistry lab supplies
😴 Accept fate and sleep through class

feedback.correct: Improvise. Adapt. Overcaffeinate. 🧪
feedback.wrong: Amateur! A true engineer finds a way!

questions.funFact: NUET students once petitioned for a coffee IV drip system in the library.

questions.question: Campus WiFi is down. Your move? 📡
options: 🔧 Become an IT expert in 5 minutes (YouTube tutorial)
📱 Hotspot from your phone (bye bye data)
🎮 Finally touch grass (just kidding, go to café)

feedback.correct: Sacrifice is the engineering way! RIP data plan 📱
feedback.wrong: Interesting choice! But data is the currency of survival.

questions.funFact: NUET WiFi password has been changed 847 times this semester. Still gets leaked.

questions.question: Forgot laptop charger. Exam in 3 hours. Battery: 12%. 🔋
options: 😰 Panic mode activated. Call everyone you know
💡 Reduce screen brightness to 0%, minimal survival
🤝 Make friends with someone who has a charger

feedback.correct: Optimization expert! Power management level: 💯
feedback.wrong: Risky! Engineers calculate, not gamble... okay we gamble.

questions.funFact: Average NUET student owns 3 chargers. Forgets all 3 at home regularly.

questions.question: Code won't compile. Deadline in 1 hour... ⚠️
options: 🔄 Keep clicking 'Run' hoping for different result
😤 Blame the compiler and submit anyway

feedback.correct: Stack Overflow: Where Engineers Thrive! 👨‍💻
feedback.wrong: Creative! But Stack Overflow is our sacred text.

questions.funFact: 97% of engineering code contains at least one line from Stack Overflow.

questions.question: Maximum consecutive all-nighters you can pull? 🌙

feedback.correct: The sweet spot! Balance between insanity and productivity! ⚖️
feedback.wrong: Either too cautious or too ambitious for your own good!

questions.funFact: World record holder for all-nighters is a NUET student (unverified, probably asleep now).

questions.question: Can you sleep standing up in the library? 📚
options: 📖 Yes, with head on textbook (premium pillow)
🧘 I've mastered power naps in any position

feedback.correct: Legend! You've unlocked: Engineering Enlightenment! 🧘
feedback.wrong: You have much to learn, young padawan...

questions.funFact: NUET library has designated 'nap zones' (unofficial, everywhere).

questions.question: Alarm rings at 7 AM for 8 AM class. You... ⏰
options: 🏃 Jump up! Time to be productive!
🛏️ Turn off alarm, decide 75% attendance is enough

feedback.correct: The NUET way! Never be on time, but never miss entirely! ⏰
feedback.wrong: Your attendance record speaks for itself...

questions.funFact: 75% attendance rule invented by a NUET student who attended 74%.

questions.question: Which NUET department matches your chaos level? 🎓

feedback.correct: A true connoisseur of chaos! Irony is life! 🎭
feedback.wrong: All departments valid! Chaos knows no boundaries!

questions.funFact: NUET departments named by students who couldn't spell at 3 AM.

questions.question: Pick your NUET hall based on vibes 🏠
options: 😴 Sleep Hall (Myth says students actually sleep there)

feedback.correct: Perfect! Gaming is networking for engineers! 🎮
feedback.wrong: Each hall has its charm... and its chaos!

questions.funFact: NUET halls compete annually in 'Most Creative Excuse' championship.

questions.question: What's your go-to NUET cafeteria order? 🍽️
options: 🥤 Energy drink collection (Pokémon, gotta catch 'em all)

feedback.correct: The breakfast of champions! And lunch. And dinner. ☕
feedback.wrong: Adventurous! But coffee is the only constant!

questions.funFact: NUET cafeteria coffee is 80% motivation, 20% grounds, 100% necessary.

questions.question: Group project. Everyone's offline. You... 👥
options: 💀 Submit nothing and let chaos reign

feedback.correct: The real MVP! Your back must hurt from carrying! 🏋️
feedback.wrong: Interesting strategy! Your group mates thank you (maybe).

questions.funFact: Solo group projects: When 'teamwork' means 'me working'.

questions.question: Practical exam surprise. Your strategy? 🔬
options: 📖 Pretend to read manual very carefully
👀 Copy from the person who looks confident
🧘 Stay calm, think logically, actually know stuff

feedback.correct: Rare! Someone who studied! You're the chosen one! 🌟
feedback.wrong: Classic moves! We've all been there, done that!

questions.funFact: Confidence in practicals is 70% posture, 30% actual knowledge.
